Pre-Game Insights: West Indies are grouped with New Zealand, Afghanistan, Uganda, and Papua New Guinea at the ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
West Indies and New Zealand are the top-ranked teams in Group C.
West Indies have a series victory against defending champions, England, towards the end of last year.
Shamar Joseph is a surprise inclusion in the West Indies squad for the tournament.
West Indies start the tournament with games against PNG and Uganda.
Papua New Guinea maintained an unbeaten record in the qualifiers, winning six consecutive matches.
Papua New Guinea kicks off their campaign with a challenging opening match against the host nation, West Indies, on June 2.
